requiredTrendData: Vibration, Seal Pot Level, Leak Temp, DCS log
aiQuestions: When did leak start? Temp/vibration spike? Recent seal work?
rootCauseLogic: Root: Seal aged/damaged. Contrib: Lubrication, misalignment.

aiQuestions: Spike in vibration? Overtemp? Oil degraded?
